#Finding all rows with missing data

```{r}
#|echo: true

rows_incomplete <- c()

for (i in 1:nrow(airquality)){
  if (any(is.na(airquality[i,]))){
    rows_incomplete <- c(rows_incomplete,i)}}
    
print(rows_incomplete)

```

#Calculate mean, sd, min, max for temperature and ozone level

```{r}
#|echo: true

##Temperature statistics
(mean_temp = mean(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE ))
(sd_temp = sd(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE))
(min_temp = min(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE))
(max_temp = max(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE))

##Ozone statistics
(mean_temp = mean(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE ))
(sd_temp = sd(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE))
(min_temp = min(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE))
(max_temp = max(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE))
```
